timeline.bodyText: Putting NoClassDefFoundError here can hide our own stupidity in other parts of this code :-( Perhaps we should narrow the window for catching NoClassDefFoundError to only the calls to testClass.getDeclaredMethods() and	testClass.getDeclaredFields() since I think that is the only source for which we need to worry about it?
